results.title: Hypoxic-ischemic related cerebrovascular changes and potential therapeutic strategies in the neonatal brain
results.text_hl: However, some studies have reported beneficial effects of @<m>DISEASE_Hypothermia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007035 @@@hypothermia@@@, @GENE_EPO @GENE_2056 @@@erythropoietin@@@, stem cell therapy, anti-cytokine therapy and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in ameliorating several different facets of @DISEASE_Thoracic_Outlet_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D013901 @@@damage to the NVU@@@ after @DISEASE_Hypoxia_Ischemia_Brain @DISEASE_MESH:D020925 @@@HI@@@-related @DISEASE_Brain_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D001930 @@@brain injury@@@ in the perinatal period.

citations.NLM: Disdier C, Stonestreet BS. Hypoxic-ischemic related cerebrovascular changes and potential therapeutic strategies in the neonatal brain J Neurosci Res. 2020 Jul;98(7):1468-1484. PMID: 32060970

results.title: Recovery from pH 6.38: lactic acidosis complicated by hypothermia.
results.text_hl: Survival after extreme arterial @DISEASE_Acidosis @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@acidosis@@@ is uncommon. A case of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ induced @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ is described where the presenting pH was 6.38 exacerbated by @<m>DISEASE_Hypothermia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007035 @@@hypothermia@@@ (29 degrees C).

results.title: Unexpected survival from severe metformin-associated lactic acidosis.
results.text_hl: We report a case of severe @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypothermia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007035 @@@hypothermia@@@ due to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment and @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@renal impairment@@@.

results.title: Rapid recovery from acute kidney injury in a patient with metformin-associated lactic acidosis and hypothermia.
results.text_hl: Rapid recovery from @DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute kidney injury@@@ in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-associated @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypothermia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007035 @@@hypothermia@@@.

results.title: Intracerebroventricular metformin decreases body weight but has pro-oxidant effects and decreases survival.
results.text_hl: In summary, our data indicate that a high dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ injected directly into the brain has remarkable @DISEASE_Neurotoxicity_Syndromes @DISEASE_MESH:D020258 @@@neurotoxic@@@ effects, as evidenced by @<m>DISEASE_Hypothermia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007035 @@@hypothermia@@@, @DISEASE_Hypoglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@hypoglycemia@@@, disrupted mitochondrial ETC flux and decreased survival rate.

citations.NLM: Portela LV, Gnoatto J, Brochier AW, Haas CB, de Assis AM, de Carvalho AK, Hansel G, Zimmer ER, Oses JP, Muller AP. Intracerebroventricular metformin decreases body weight but has pro-oxidant effects and decreases survival. Neurochem Res. 2015 Mar;40(3):514-23. PMID: 25492133

results.title: Hemodialysis-refractory metformin-associated lactate acidosis with hypoglycemia, hypothermia, and bradycardia in a diabetic patient with belated diagnosis and chronic kidney disease : .

results.title: Successful treatment of severe lactic acidosis caused by a suicide attempt with a metformin overdose.
results.text_hl: Here, we report a 43-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ and @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic renal insufficiency@@@ who developed @DISEASE_Hypoglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@hypoglycemia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Hypothermia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007035 @@@hypothermia@@@, @DISEASE_Tachycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@ and @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ after a suicide attempt with a @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ @DISEASE_Drug_Overdose @DISEASE_MESH:D062787 @@@overdose@@@.

results.title: Metformin-associated lactic acidosis and acute renal failure in a type 2 diabetic patient.
results.text_hl: In these cases, the plasma concentration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is not necessarily abnormally high.
